ToLNet components
12 Oct 2020  
tol  

Description:

A discussion of the main elements of ToLNet

Verification #

  • Public Key Rings
  • First Verified by other members

Network #

  • Private
  • Multi-layered
  • Distributed

Blockchain #

  • Accountability
  • Governance
  • Regulate
  • Record

Local currency/tokens #

Tree structure #

Message Brokers #

  • fail safe
  • log everything
  • everything (mostly) as a message
  • leverage existing technology
    • severless
    • responsive

Organic #

  • spread only by word-of-mouth
  • hand out cards, with code
    • needs to be activated.
    • i call in say i have handed out card (activate)
